name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and pickles, sandwiched between soft burger buns.

name: Caprese Salad
description: A refreshing salad featuring ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, and fragrant basil leaves, drizzled with balsamic glaze.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A creamy pasta dish made with spaghetti, crispy bacon, Parmesan cheese, and a rich egg-based sauce.

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Grilled chicken breast served on a bed of crisp romaine lettuce, tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

description: A colorful stir-fry featuring a variety of fresh vegetables, cooked in a savory sauce and served over steamed rice.

name: Homemade Pizza
description: A homemade pizza with a crispy crust topped with tangy tomato sauce, gooey mozzarella cheese, and your favorite toppings.
